p: HEK293 cells, or HFF cells were lysed in l ml NP-40 lysis buffer (20 mM Tris-HCl [pH 7.4], 150 mM NaCl, 1 mM EDTA, 1% Nonidet P-40, 10 μg/ml aprotinin, 10 μg/ml leupeptin, and 1 mM phenylmethyl sulfonyl fluoride). Coimmunoprecipitation and immunoblot analysis were performed as previously described [ 56, 57]
